context.content: "Speed" is a 1994 action thriller film starring Keanu Reeves and Sandra Bullock. The story follows a young police officer who must prevent a bomb from exploding on a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph. It's filled with intense action sequences and a gripping plot that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
That sounds like an interesting premise. Can you tell me more about the pacing and the level of suspense in the movie?

context.content: "The Fast and the Furious" is the first film in the "Fast & Furious" franchise. The story follows an undercover cop, Brian O'Conner (Paul Walker), who infiltrates the world of illegal street racing to investigate a series of truck hijackings. He forms a bond with Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel), the leader of the racing crew suspected of the hijackings. The film features intense racing sequences and a mix of action and suspense as the story unfolds.
